com.communote.server.core.common.caching

Interface CacheManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EhCacheManager

    public interface CacheManager
    Interface describing a cache manager that manages a Cache.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getAdditionalCaches()
      Returns a list of all additional caches managed by CacheManager.
      Cache getCache()
      Returns the cache managed by this manager.
      void init(Properties properties)
      Called to initialize the cache manager from properties.
      void invalidateAdditionalCache(String id)
      Invalidates the additional cache with the given id.
      void invalidateMainCache()
      Invalidates the whole main cache.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown hook that allows the cache manager to do any kind of clean-up operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdditionalCaches

        List<String> getAdditionalCaches()
        Returns a list of all additional caches managed by CacheManager.
        Returns:
        a list of additional caches, an empty list if no additional caches are managed

      • getCache

        Cache getCache()
        Returns the cache managed by this manager.
        Returns:
        the cache

      • init

        void init(Properties properties)
   throws CacheManagerInitializationException
        Called to initialize the cache manager from properties. The manager might use this method to initialize the associated cache.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties object that can contain cache manager specific settings to set up the manager
        Throws:
        CacheManagerInitializationException - if the manager or underlying cache could not be initialized

      • invalidateAdditionalCache

        void invalidateAdditionalCache(String id)
                        throws CacheException
        Invalidates the additional cache with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the cache
        Throws:
        CacheException - if id of the cache could not be found or invalidation fails

      • invalidateMainCache

        void invalidateMainCache()
                  throws CacheException
        Invalidates the whole main cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException - if invalidation fails

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown hook that allows the cache manager to do any kind of clean-up operations. This method is usually called when the application is shutting down.
